website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, these wireless earbuds offer nice fit and sound that make them a great deal for the under $100 price point.
pros: Comfortable fit that isn't too loose or too tight
Earbuds include a handy case, and are backed by a satisfaction guarantee
cons: Rare reports of faulty earbuds with crackly sound
Some issues syncing with some devices noted

customer_reviews.title: Awesome earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprising. Sound is awesome. I teach school and had some of my students try these out all have a thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price, great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great price, great comfort. Low profile when wearing. Not bulky, stays snug. Case has magnetic lid, but wished it was hinged. I definitely recommend to buy
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and the sound of my Upperfit earbuds. I am so happy I found the perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Rivera

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for a week before this review. VERY Impressed! Easy to read instructions and connecting! GREAT SOUND! AND they stay in place. I will not go back to wired ear buds, even if they are Blue tooth. Man these are super. So far I have about 7.5 hours on this charge and still going. Give these UPPERFIT EARBUDS a chance to show you how great they are!
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and design! Excellent wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I've had several wireless earbuds in past, big brands that cost way more than 100$ per piece. In my opinion, these one's are better in terms of sound, comfort, battery and design! Price is unbeatable. First time I tried them I was really amazed. Upperfit Epic earbuds won my vote - I will be getting several new one's for my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Krasilnikova

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding! So Far.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several other earbuds and returned several as well. This product is a perfect fit for me. They stay in place extremely well. Running/lifting, what ever. I am really surprised with its compactness, compared to the size of other earbuds, they are super light and the sound quality is spot on. When using the earbuds no one even notices that I am using earbuds. Which is not the case with many other brands/styles. This is purchase is a "no brainer". My only thing I have not tested is the battery life and that will be tested in the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: andrew merkle

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, next generation wireless earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality earbuds. Just love the sound! Love the EPIIC!
customer_reviews.author: MJWolfe

customer_reviews.title: Impressive true wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality as I've never experienced before. These wireless earbuds are very impressive - quality is definitely there. I'm using them just couple of days but I can feel the difference. I even like better my favorite songs because of these earbuds. Great ones! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Berger STop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why there are so many 5 star, but these are horrible Battery last at MOST 3 hours You can take about 10 steps away from your device for distance and it disconnects randomly Design is poor it hurts your ears, I could barely wear it for more than 20 minutes Sound quality is bad, again it fades in and out You will hear everything around you, there is zero noise canceling. Would definitely return Only pro is that it pairs easily
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality ear buds !
customer_reviews.text: These fit and are comfortable to wear sound quality is very good I have used them for podcasts, phone calls and music with no problems. I cant comment yet on noise cancelling quality or the battery life ills have only had them for a few days but I'm certain there won't be any issues. Fyi, when only using one ear bud you must use the left one as the right bud is the slave bud otherwise they are very nice wireless ear buds with great sound quality. I highly recommend these for real listening freedom!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I was SO excited to receive these after reading the positive reviews. They are complete garbage! Pairing was simple, but only one earbud will give audio output and the sound quality is comparable to something you might get at your local dollar store. Total garbage, will be returning immediately. The glowing reviews must be from people who received the product free and were paid for their review, not users who spent their own hard earned money looking for a quality product (like me). Run far away from these!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Loses bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: Since purchasing them 4 months ago. The battery life has gone from 5hrs of contact use to right around 3-4. Since about 3 months after purchase. The right ear bud only. While in standby (on but not being used) will at random just disconnect and immediately reconnect to bluetooth. If it is connected to a call or music it does not disconnect/reconnect. This happens at random. Sometimes it constantly disconnects/reconnects every minute and sometimes its several minutes in between and sometimes it can be up to an hour. But while using the right ear bud only this happens constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Tony H.

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: NOT WATERPROOF, WILL NOT WITHSTAND ANY TYPE OF MOISTURE. DO NOT BUY IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR WATERPROOF EARBUDS.
customer_reviews.author: Christhoper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these earbuds! So comfortable to wear, crystal clear sound, extremely easy to pair and connect to device! No regrets in purchasing them. Best earbuds on the market! Will definitely purchase again for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable loss of connection
customer_reviews.text: These fit beautifully and the little charger case is well-made and satisfying. Sadly, they absolutely suck at holding a connection. If you turn your head even a bit, you'll get a brief interruption. The package has a whole set of instructions for improving connection — which, right there, is a bad sign — but even after following them all, I get crappy signal on my 6S. I've been burned by crappy bluetooth headphones before, and I wanted so badly to like them, but they've ended up a hugely disappointing waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: PK Merlott

customer_reviews.title: nice wireless bluetooth buds
customer_reviews.text: I use these for working out at the gym and they fit great. Pros: I like that you can change the song tracks using the ear buds, great fit Cons: battery life is not that great and you can't adjust volume from the buds. Once you hear the low battery warning in the ear buds, they'll be dead within a minute so there is no early warning about the battery life. To avoid this, best to check the buds battery life on the device (phone) and keep them charged using the case. Sound quality is ok. Overall nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ross

customer_reviews.title: These sound incredible for the price. Very nice Bass!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three different budget wireless earbuds during Amazon Prime Day 2019. All three work well. These are the clear winners in terms of sound. The bass is excellent. The highs are not muffled. They aren't the easiest to pair out of the charging case. It usually takes me going into the bluetooth settings and selecting them. They are also big and a little heavier than others I tried, so on long hot afternoons, they start to wear on you. However, the sound makes these my go to budget earbuds. For the price, They are excellent. BTW - I also liked SZSAGO TWS Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Earbuds Headset W5s in the same price category.
customer_reviews.author: L. Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a cross country trip and they are great and easy to pack and having the case recharging them quickly up to 5 times was awesome! Recently I've been using them while mowing and working in the yard which not having a wire to get in the way or get twisted up is awesome. They do cut out from time to time (thus the minus one star), but only for a moment. They have great sound and I don't really even notice them.
customer_reviews.author: 'Ski

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have listened to the other reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these headphones are great.. the way they look, the holder, the way they fit but it is missing one very important part.... THE LEFT EAR DOESN'T EVEN WORK. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: SHughes

customer_reviews.title: Had them for 4 months, and having a hard time pairing them together.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for 4 months now. I liked them a lot more than my previous Bluetooth headset. They stayed in my ears better, and cancelled the street noise while walking downtown a lot better than others. The battery also had a good life. I've been having a lot of trouble with them recently. Not sure what happened, but the right earphone won't automatically connect to the left one, and if I turn it off, I have to return it to the charger before it will turn on again. I expect these to have a life expectantcy, but 4 months is not long enough. Very disapointed that I'll have to be finding a new pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy
customer_reviews.text: Mine randomly glitch and cut out for a few seconds and it’s incredibly frusturating. I paid 60$ for earphones and I expect to be able to listen to the entirety of a song. I am not sure about how to get a refund but if anyone knows i would appreciate knowing how.
customer_reviews.author: Joey ribble

customer_reviews.title: Only good if you're listening to something
customer_reviews.text: These are ok at best. If you aren't listening to anything then the earbuds will disconnect randomly and if you're paired with a tablet that's running Win10 then the earbuds disconnect and will fail to reconnect unless you restart the device. Even then it's only 50/50.
customer_reviews.author: Karon Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, stay in ears well but relatively short battery life.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds have good sound ,are comfortable to wear and stay in your ears well. The one thing thing that disappoints me is you cannot turn on just a single earbud to talk on the phone while driving. They have to both have to be turned on and paired together before they can be paired with another device. Even if you leave one out of you ear it causes the person you are talking with to hear an echo. I do like the compact charging case but the battery life of the earbuds is not that long.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J Krause

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these wireless earbuds. They fit my smaller ears very well with the included changeable ear pads. While I am not an audiophile, I think the sound is great. The customer service was very good. I initially had a problem with getting them to pair and they helped me through that issue. One of the earbuds would not charge properly and they replaced my unit and now everything works really well. One recommendation iI would have is that they somehow add a hinge or some kind of attachment to the lid of the charging unit. Overall very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. V.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: First week, earbuds paired well. Problem is, the left earbud went in and out and I had to reset them multiple times. When that stopped working and earbuds just didn’t even work, I contacted Amazon. They suggested to reach out to manufacturer. They suggested the same troubleshooting directions that the online pamphlet gives, and still no solution and no working earbuds. They even started not holding a battery even after charging them. I ended up returning them due to similar reviews saying the same thing and not wanting to deal with the same issue. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: koolblues

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best earbuds out there for the price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely blown away with the quality of these ear buds! I did quite a bit of research before purchasing and I’m so glad I did. I was a little reluctant because of the price point being so low, but absolutely would pay more if I had to! Linked up to my Apple Watch within seconds of pulling them out of the package. Fit so snug in my ears. Perfect for my runs. Sound quality is absolutely clear and crisp! If you’re hesitant on buying these, just stop right now and pull the trigger. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Great Device!
customer_reviews.text: They were a Christmas gift to my wife. Once setup on my wife's phone, she's now totally wireless.She says they work great while she listens to her podcasts, receives/sends calls. She said the sound is really good listening to music. Thanks for a great quality affordable wireless ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Five stars. Everything about these True Wireless Earbuds Headphones are excellent. I like the Superior 3D Stereo Sound; the 5.0 Mini in Ear Bluetooth Earbuds; and the 18 hr (this may vary) play time (depending on the charge). The outer box and the rechargeable snap case are cool too. These have such a clear signal listing to music. With phone calls using the voice mic, the talk time lasts about 4.5 hrs (depending on the charge). The earbuds fit comfortably. The price is right in my budget. I'll buy another pair to have as a back up pair. This IS the future of listening pleasure to enjoy! Loving life right now with these. I'll never go back to wires. Peace
customer_reviews.author: Ambient Design CO

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These are great ear buds. The sound is fantastic and the noise canceling is great! They have a comfortable fit and they last a long time on one charge. The best part is there is no fading in and out like most ear buds. The only thing that would make them better is if the magnetic cap was attached somehow. I keep dropping it. It’s not a deal breaker though. The quality of these ear buds is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Must use both earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these BUT you have to keep both ear buds close to each other. If you don’t keep them close they do not connect and they both turn off. Not happy about that!! Typically I only use one side of earbuds. They also just don’t quite fit in my ears. I mostly notice this when I am walking around. I think my ears are small. I would only recommend to people who will use these sitting down at a desk.
customer_reviews.author: JustineMarie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and reliable design
customer_reviews.text: Headphones have high quality sound just like my 200 dollars beat headphones that only lasted 6 months due to a battery problem. The software could improve by not allowing the customer to connect to individual headphone until both are paired. Almost didn’t find them but glad I did before throwing away more money on popular headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Stopped charging after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: They are not the easiest earbuds to operate, but the sound is good. However they stopped charging after just 3 months of purchasing them. I purchased the 4 yr portable electronic plan through square trade and file a claim, they referred me back to the manufacturer as they should still be under their guarantee. The manufacturer just passed the ball and told me I should go through amazon to replace them. Poor costumer service! Thumbs down for "DAN" for passing the ball and not resolving my issue! Thumbs up for amazon for giving me a refund for this poor quality earbuds!! contacted Upperfit and they just passed the ball by referring me back to amazon
customer_reviews.author: Alejnadra Urbano

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bad boys during Prime Day on sale, so they were even cheaper than normal. I've used them while mowing the lawn and while they didn't drown out the loud sound, they did great! Pairing them was relatively simple - just follow the instructions. Highly recommended unless you're a real audiophile and you need perfect clarity. For the remainder of us normal humans, they're great!
customer_reviews.author: BrianP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying/searching for wireless earbuds that would suit my needs while running and exercising. With no hesitation i am glad to say that i have finally found them. I usually don't leave reviews but had to for this one. While my previous earbuds would fall out as i start sweating, these don't. They stay on I believe because of the piece tht clips just under the concha of your ear that holds the earpiece firm. In addition the sound is great and it blocks the noise just fine for me. I give all thumps up for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of earbuds stopped working after second use.
customer_reviews.text: I used these earbuds twice. the first pairing with Bluetooth work flawlessly, but on second use the right earbud stopped pairing and wouldn't work . Not a good experience with battery life either, maybe and hour and a half lifetime. Not very impressed by product for price. I would REALLY like them fixed or get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Wire free Great Stereo Sound
customer_reviews.text: My primary use is to listen to music sent from my MacBook Pro. My home wifi doesn't allow me listen to high quality stereo very far from its source. One user told me he had a range of 100' with his phone, the spec, I think is 40'. I get 30' in a straight line, but less when walls separate me from my source. But, still, it's great sound wire free!
customer_reviews.author: On-line shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice ear buds
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - I have used these s few times. Set up - pairing with my iPhone was simple and quick. Instructions are good and they work well. Sound quality is good - better than I expected with a good bit of depth to it. I actually went back and purchased a 2nd pair for my hubby. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Battery
customer_reviews.text: Love the case, small and compact. Headphones stay in ears and help block out background noise. Not great ambient noise but you do have the option of turning it on and off. I haven't yet used these on a plane for the true ambient test.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Clair Darden

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my semi-wireless headphones (which are bluetooth, but left and right are wired together). I primarily use them for running and they generally stay in my ear, unless I am too sweaty. They don't seem to be affected by sweat, but the position of the phone is critical for decent usage. Sadly, I prefer to keep my phone in my right back pocket, so these headphones cut out a lot and sometimes have a really weird delay of about a tenth of a second between the two sides, causing the sound to have an annoying echo. I'll keep using them, because I enjoy the truly wireless feature, but I'm eagerly looking for a replacement with better technology.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, spotty connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Great sound and bass - Super easy to connect to my phone - No issues with the charging case Cons - The bluetooth CONSTANTLY loses signal, which means that there are non stop interruptions when listening to my music. I can't even listen with one earbud because it irritates the heck out of me. The only saving grace is that when I listen with both buds, they lose signal independently of each other so I don't notice as much. Overall, even though I like the sound these have I would not buy them again because of the bluetooth issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tia M

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds can take some abuse and still work great! I've somehow broke the screen inside earpiece, maybe it's the one that went through a complete wash and dry cycle in a pocket of my jeans .... Still has good sound quality! The charging case is sturdy and the magnets are perfect to keep case together and buds safely charging. The prongs in case can stick in the down position and bud won't charge if you don't check them before you charge. They also are the best fitting of any earbud I've used. Very comfortable and small enough to not be a hindrance with movement. I've never had one fall out which is a 5 star bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds sound great. The last several hours before needing recharged. They are water resistant. I need to comment on Upperfit's customer service.. I did have an issue with the left ear bud not turning on after 4 months, but customer service was fantastic. I had new ear buds at my front door in 3 days. Customer service like that is hard to find in today's world. Over all these ear buds are great. I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Easy connection, doesn't fall out even when running, great sound, charge lasted more than 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! is all I can say. So glad I got these and bought a pair for my husband. He is very much a perfectionist when it comes to audio quality, and he thoroughly enjoying these ear pods. And I didn't have to spend a ridiculous amount of money. I got two pair for less than the price of one pair of the "other" brand name. Highly recommend but make sure you buy from the Ikanzi StoreUS!.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: They're working very well for me. Not sure about the noise cancellation didn't realize it had that so I think I'll have to pay more attention next time I use them at work. I lost my instruction manual and was unable to find it online if I had a complaint that would be the only one
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Salzman

customer_reviews.title: Right side EAR bud is not working
customer_reviews.text: I have got this product in the month of January 2019 and I had a frequent issues with this product where the right side ear bud is not at all working and it says simply "POWER ON", after that I don't ear any thing in the right bud.before that both the ear buds used to pair properly , Iam waiting for upperfit customer care to review this comment and provide a feed back
customer_reviews.author: Seshu Dheeraj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wireless ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my fiancee, he loves the smaller wireless headphones that fit right in the ear, the last pair he had bought were over $100 at best buy and they worked ok but fit funny in the ear and after 6 months of using them they dont hold a charge anymore. We saw these ones on a lightning sale on Amazon and decided to give them a try. He loves the way they fit in the ear, the sound is great as well as it cancels out outside noise and he loves the size of the case and that they fit in nice and snug. I'm considering getting a pair for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good foe the price
customer_reviews.text: Initial pairing took a couple of tries, but once done no further issues. Sound is quite clear, better than expected. If I had one complaint it would be the use of the control button once it is in your ear is a little difficult to use, but if you are simply streaming music it should not concern you as much. Also it does not come with different size inserts for comfort, although what comes with was not terrible. I used them initially while doing yard work, and although they felt to loosen from my ear, they never fell out. In general I am pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Stelmaszewski

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these.
customer_reviews.text: The LED lights do not work properly and I can't even get them to pair to each other. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: True Sales
customer_reviews.text: My surprise gift was a hit, everything from the packaging to the un-boxing to reveal the item were as advertised. With the easy set up, thanks to the informative manual, it was a breeze to have the gift ready for use once it was given. Battery life unused last for 3 days, please remember this was a gift a surprise gift. Once they were connected via Bluetooth with no issues, he had mentioned that the sound quality is great. The only slight issue was with the size, he felt it was a little big but definitely light weight and a good snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Does not last 18 hours
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around Amazon a lot for these headphones, comparing price and quality. The biggest sell for me was the 18hr music play time. I bought these as a gift for my husband who uses this at work. Did not realize that these don't even last half the work day because he did not want to complain about a present. Really disappointed in this product and should have just bought the $30 one that tells you up front that it only lasts 4 hours. Sound quality and noise cancelling is good. But really does not last 18 hours as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Maze

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoddy
customer_reviews.text: They work... but they're not worth your money. The battery case is magnetic, but it's annoying because it's slippery and there's nothing to grip on to so it isn't easy to open. Also the earbuds don't always charge when they're in there unless you get them just right. And the charging light can be deceiving. The left earbud can work on it's own, but the right can't. It loses it's signal from time to time too. The paint is also chipping already after a month. I don't recommend these headphones even on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Day

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing earbuds 100%
customer_reviews.text: Love these earbuds. 1st they arrived rightnin time, 2nd I opened them and followed the directions to charge and pair to my phone, they paired right away with no issues, the fit in the ear is comfortable and the sound quality is phenomenal! I recommend these earbud to anyone looking for wireless earbuds 100%!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are crap & have some issues
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where all the positive reviews are coming from but so far my experience with the upperfit wireless earbuds is horrible My complaint is that the left ear bud just randomly unpairs it's self with the right And the only way I can get them paired back up is if I take them out put them back in their case let them sit for a min then take them out put them back in and power them up I've only been using them for a day so far and it's been a constant problem I ordered a replacement pair but I swear if I have the same problems I'm just gonna ask for my $$$ back
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Was originally looking to get the Apple Airpods but just didn't feel right forking over $150 for a set of Bluetooth earbuds, don't get me wrong, I'm sure it's fantastic but for more than half the price of the Airpods, you get this terrific product that's easy to use. Pairing was super easy, sounds quality is great, comfortable, and again more than half of cost. So if you have extra money to throw around, then go ahead and get the Apple, but if you don't care about the name brand but like well designed product at a great price, then get this product.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about a month now. I am enjoying them a lot. The sound quality is good and they are easy to use. I do have to stick them pretty far in my ears to get the full bass & noise cancellation. I really like not having to deal with wires sticking out of my phone.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Could not pair
customer_reviews.text: Had these and could only get them paired to each other one time. Tried many times powering off phone, earbuds, reaching out to customer service but no luck. Did the "hold in your hand pressing the power button for 8 seconds" still nothing. They sounded great the time I did get them paired however the frustration getting them paired led me to returning this product and looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mines didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this item for a trip. It arrived on time, however, the right side doesn't work. This is so frustrating. I stayed on the phone with a tech for out 20 minutes. None of the troubleshooting options worked. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are incredibly comfortable. I've worn them while sleeping and throughout the day with no issue or discomfort. The charging case is also very convenient and fits easily in my pocket or purse. The sound quality is good, though I do wish the volume went slightly higher. That would help with the noise cancelling as well. Finally, a longer charging cord would be great. The existing one is only about three inches and won't even reach to a table or desk if charged via an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Casanta

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The best earbuds I’ve ever bought. I’ve bought a lot over the last couple years from $10 to $250. The best thing about these earbuds over the expensive ones is you can listen to them individually. This is important to me because I like to listen to music all day at work. It’s super easy to pair them my phone. I just have to take one out of the charging case turn it on and it pairs automatically. The only thing I regret is not buying these sooner. Thanks for making a great product that has every feature that I want in an earbud.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Grabiec

customer_reviews.title: Good all around earphones
customer_reviews.text: The earphones are great, they provide great sound along with great bass and treble, they easily pair to each other and to my iPhone, I walked about 50 feet from my phone and they were still connected and playing music. The charging case is nice with the sleek black finish and the small size of it, the magnetic cover is awesome too. My only down side to it is if you could just use one earphone at a time sometimes instead of having both connected because I like to hear my music and also hear what is going on around me sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Oviedo

customer_reviews.title: all around, great wireless, bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: headphones are great so far. Battery life is longer than advertised, the sound quality is great, and noise from outside the headphones is very minimal. haven’t really sweat in them, so I cannot comment on that. The ear pieces fit in. my ear well, and even stay in place while doing cardio. will definitely buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wright

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: There are alot of BT earbuds on the market. I couldn't afford the $200-300 top end earbuds. Upperfit are comfortable and deliver quality sound. Pairing is easy, and they hold a charge as well as notify me of the current charge capacitance when I pair it up with my note 9. It's cool and I'm pleased with my buds. I bought a second pair for my brother. He loves the UPPERFIT. He has an Apple iphone and has an easy time using, pairing and listening to his music.
customer_reviews.author: Steven the dude

customer_reviews.title: Regretting Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My right ear piece is always dying really fast. When I try and only use the left one, anytime I get a phone call and disconnect the call and try and resume music/movie, the left one doesn't have any sound. I have to go and mess with the right and left ear pieces for a good 5-10 minutes before I can get the left one to connect on its own and start working. Really regretting purchasing this item. It was great at first but I haven't even had them for a year and this is happening. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Gorr

customer_reviews.title: Right earbud cut in and out
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design and the charger for these earbuds but the right ear would not keep a connection and would cut in and out. I thought it might be the way I was working them, but it wasn't. I returned these and kept the other pair of earbuds made by soundPeats, which work great.
customer_reviews.author: Ksherms

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great sound and durability.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I've been using them for over a year. I accidentally had them in the ocean and once through washing machine and they still work perfectly. I will be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Perrault

customer_reviews.title: Nice stereo sound
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound of these but they cut out if you turn your head a certain direction. Also, they tend to all of a sudden pop out of your ear. if you can deal with those annoyances, the price is great. Also, all of the comments about difficult to pair - quick and easy. read the instructions first. It only takes a few seconds. You pair them once and they're ready to go from then on.
customer_reviews.author: Rick A.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price I paid! Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the sound quality for the price of these yearbooks. They fit great. They don’t fall out when you’re exercising. I purchased a pair for myself and then I bought another pair for my wife. Great product. I still can’t believe they’re only $50!
customer_reviews.author: Jester

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were better
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good buy and the sound quality is good; that's when you are actually able to get both the left and right buds to work. I never have issue with the left but the right bud has issues with the sound going in and out. I have tried various ways of connecting the two buds before connecting them to the phone but nothing seems to work long. I really want to love the product but terribly disappointed with the quality and the difficulty of getting the product I bought to work properly
customer_reviews.author: Clay Mckendree

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality. 2 Died in 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom. It worked for 2 weeks and died. I figured it may be a fluke so instead of returning it, I got a replacement one. Well, 2 months later and the replacement one died. 2 died in 3 months which is horrible in reliability. Now I can’t return because I’m outside of the return window. Don’t waste your hard earned money on this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Hoa

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a pair of earbuds that have started cutting out and not pairing and I’m pleasantly surprised by them. They stay in my ears better than any ear buds I’ve used in a long time and they’re easy to use. Quick pairing and charging is a plus. The sound quality is better than I thought it’d be for the price. Overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Bummer!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but they do not stay in my ears. The charging case doesn’t hold a charge so no recharging on the go. Buds, the left side doesn’t hold a charge, it’s out within the hour when I am not even listening to music or on the phone, as soon I get on the phone left bud announces low battery and shuts off. Needed these for hands free work calls while on the road. It is against the law to be on the phone while driving unless it is hands free. If they don’t work, they are useless!
customer_reviews.author: Sj

customer_reviews.title: Sound good. Pain bad.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound good. The battery life is decent as well. The issue is that they hurt my ears. So much so that I cannot wear them for longer than an hour without my ear starting to hurt. Not from volume but from their shape. Unfortunately, I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brummel

customer_reviews.title: Do not use for exercise!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So these ear buds worked for the nfirst week I had them. I used them as ordinary earbuds. However as soon as I used them to go jogging, they started glitching on me. It would fade out the noise and come back. I thought it was my music data at first but then I noticed I was on offline mode so it wasn't the music. Then I realized everytime I jogged, which was me shaking the ear buds it would fade out. I bought them so I could jog with them, so they are worthless now.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought 3 pairs of these earphones. The last pair for myself. The quality of the earphones are high. My favorite part is the way they stay in my ear. I’m excited to do yard work and not have them fall out! If you are looking for a high quality wireless earphones here you go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife, and after wearing them for 30 min, it started to hurt her ear. It got worse the next day. It was the plastic piece that hold the ear bud on the outside of the ear. It seems that should have some kind of foam attachment to make it more comfortable, so we had to return them. Paring didn't match the instructions, so it took longer to pair. Theses seem like great headphones, they just fell short for us.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my wife. So far they are not living up to the high reviews
customer_reviews.text: So far these have not lived up to the reviews. We had a lot of trouble pairing them together. Also, both buds were put on the charger overnight. My wife went for a walk this morning and the right bud lost it's charge?? Not sure what happened to it? I have placed both of them back on the charger to recharge. I guess we will see what happens. So far, i'm pretty disappointed. Any advice from Upperfit certainly would help.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: I normally like to give products a chance but these earbuds are truly not that great. The right one goes in and out like there is a short in the wire. When using only one it consistently beeps in my ear. And the sound fluctuates up and down even with the volume on max. If I had it to do all over again I would probably choose another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Fred foxx

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on a whim and happy I did! The sound is great and they fit perfectly in my ear. No wires to mess with. I'm very happy with these earbuds!
customer_reviews.author: E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, great sound. Needs improvements to technology
customer_reviews.text: Great sound very stable and very comfortable but, the connection is interrupted easily. Walking with my phone on my pocket, the signal to one or the other is lost intermittently. If I am wearing a headlamp the signal to right one is constantly inturrupted maybe by the battery? Also fragile, I dropped one and the button cover broke off. Over all good earphones.
customer_reviews.author: cwa83

customer_reviews.title: Lasted me four months-very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I thought they would be perfect for wearing to the gym while I workout. I’ve had them for four months, I use them almost every day and the left bud suddenly stopped working last week. So plan on having to replace them frequently if you’re looking for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: CKMom

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the charge times
customer_reviews.text: While there is no doubt about all the features bragged about, the time they last between charges in nowhere near what is claimed. Mine are good for about 3 hours, max, before they tell me that they are low on power. Have to admit that it is nice that they talk to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dedicated Friend

customer_reviews.title: I love the battery, last about 8-10 hours for me
customer_reviews.text: Ok, ok, I have had these for a few months now, they are awesome, the microphone is great, I don't have to repeat myself like with the others I have had.
customer_reviews.author: yanet

customer_reviews.title: Careful with these
customer_reviews.text: Love them when I work out or just do whatever, no one can easily tell you're using them. It is kind of annoying though that you are unable to use the right earbud by itself but you can use the left one by itself. Also the signal sucks sometimes and only the left one works but it lasts like a millisecond but it has been occurring more often the longer I own them, it is making me a bit concerned.
customer_reviews.author: RickHavez

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy!!! A complete headache to pair to two pieces to one another, let alone to bluetooth. Once you finally get it connected to bluetooth you find out you get approximately 3 feet of range. Stand up and walk away from your phone and the signal dies within feet. Plus, you get to do it all over again every time you turn it on. It's really a crap product. I'm really confused how anyone can give this product a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Jdub

customer_reviews.title: Work well and very good sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound was fading in and out a little bit when I first used them but they may not have been charged all the way. I used one ear bud today while snowboarding and it fit really well and for having only one in and the sound was very good. It also stayed in my ear while snowboarding and didn't dislodge. This time the sound did not fade in and out. Overall I am pleased with them so far. Also they paired very easily to my iphone. I would recommend them for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: I found out how to wear them myself I wore them upside down and they kept falling out but in the right position they are awesome so no negative comments here
customer_reviews.author: Albert Amoyaw

customer_reviews.title: As good as expensive brand.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to others about the same or simultaneous these are best. They're just as good as the overpriced brand. My teens used them daily, I purchased warranty in case later on there's an issue, but so far no problem s.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: It works just great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. It has good range too. Accidentaly went into the kitchen-but could still hear the tv just fine. I couldn't rate the 'moisture wicking' because I haven't had it that long. But otherwise, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jercur40

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: so i bought these and they worked great for a few months- I would only use them once or twice a week while doing homework and stuff so they werent used for a long period of time..the LEFT one stopped working all of a sudden. It doesn't charge, wont turn on, doesn't light up- NOTHING- Not work the price since I didn't get a full year out of these. Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tams

customer_reviews.title: Right ear bud has scratchy sound when inserted must be something loose in it
customer_reviews.text: The right ear bud has a static sound but after some fiddling with it sometimes it works. Can't say for battery life or noise cancelling as it doesn't work out of the box they are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: comfortable, decent battery life, stay in ear without falling out, easy to pair/sync, price is right at $50 Cons: audio randomly cuts out when outside (wind/breeze appears to affect), also cuts out when running, lifting weights, swinging a golf club, etc Overall, these are NOT good for exercise, yard work, or really any physical activity. They are totally fine for listening to podcasts while sitting at your desk however.
customer_reviews.author: PEJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stable sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought the earphones last week and have used them in the gym twice. Stable while in use with good quality. I have not tested range beyond a few feet, no reception problems in that range. Battery life seems good, listened for over an hour with no low battery indications. Set up easy and charging pod has magnetic closure. IMO, this is a forward thinking manufacturer. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell D Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Order them. You are gonna be surprised how good they are
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time wih sar bud,most hurt my ears but these feel like the were made for my ears.. I can wea these for hours.sound quality is really good for the price range. Battery life has been great. Listen to music 5hrs+ while mowing. I would order these again without hesitation
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ergonomics and sound are top notch
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend who works graveyards. She loves them and says the sound quality and noise cancellation is amazing. The battery lasts the hours she is sleeping (6-8) and then straight through to the gym as well. She has an iphone and I refuse to invest in anything apple. The bluetooth connected to her iphone simply and quickly and stays connected. Amazing product for an amazing price...who needs air pods!!
customer_reviews.author: JULIE W.

customer_reviews.title: easy pairing and amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality actually shocked me when it fired up for the first time. They fit comfortably in my small ears and do a fantastic job canceling out exterior noise. I'm getting about 4 hrs per charge. (I haven't kept track of the pod case charge, but it easily lasts the day). My only complaint is the voice quality on calls- people have said I sound like I'm far from the mic. Overall, definitely a great value and I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shayjay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Havent had them for even 3 months and they dont charge anymore
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good , great sound , great carry little box , everythung is good about this product , i usually have max volume of bluetooth all the time with thisbones i have it half way because the sound is so good and loud , love them.
customer_reviews.author: Perez

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and fit of these are great - when they work. I have only been able to get them to work about twice and I have had them for 2 months now. Even if they are on the charger overnight, one or both lose battery power after about 20 minutes. Very frustrating. Don't waste your time/money. I missed the return window, but am going to try and get them replaced. I will update on how that goes. . . .
customer_reviews.author: ME Baker

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pros: sound great and very comfortable Cons: I have a hard time keeping them in my ears, they fall out alot. It might be the way I'm wearing them, not sure. And the batteries don't last as long as advertised. They say 18 but I'm getting around 4 with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyjelly

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheaper alternative to airpods. They're pretty good for the price. The battery is decent. My one problem is that the connection can be quite choppy at times, especially if the battery is running low. Overall, the sound quality is great and the bass sounds amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Aliberti

product_meta.title: True Wireless Earbuds Headphones, Superior 3D Stereo Sound 5.0 Mini Totally Wireless in Ear Earbuds, 18Hr Play Time, SweatProof Sports Earphones Headset, Built in Mic w/Dual Speakers for Phone Calls
product_meta.description:
UPPERFIT TRUE WIRELESS EARBUDS - NEXT GENERATION OF SOUND !

If 3D surround sound, smooth treble, and DEEP BASS BEAT motivates you to get moving and make life happen, then you’ll love how 

Upperfit wireless headphones deliver. 3D surround sound speakers, sound amplifying noise cancelling technology, and 

 IPX4 waterproof, sweat proof earbuds work synergistically, providing the best listening experience on the market.

18 TOTAL HOURS LISTENING TIME – AUTOMATIC ON / OFF CHARGING

Step 1 – Charge Portable Power Pouch using included micro USB cable

Step 2 – Remove Power Pouch from Plug

Step 3 – Stick Earbuds into Power Pouch. It automatically starts charge when you close the lid, and stops when 

 your earbuds are fully charged, providing 5 total charges, each generating 3.5 - 4 hours of listening time

STAYS ULTRA-STABLE & CONNECTED – 40 FEET RANGE

Walk, clean, dance, and move about the room with our long range headphones. 

You’ll experience crystal clear call quality, and crisp, strong beats, up to 40 feet from your compatible device.

SUPERIOR COMFORT, UNRIVALED VERSATILITY

Earbuds tuck snugly and comfortably into your ear, while earhook caps ensure they stay in place, without chafing, slipping or sliding around.

When You Order Today You’re Getting: 

 * UpperFit wireless headphones with microphone
 * Charging power pouch case
 * 3 ear hook caps
 * Micro USB Cable


100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE

You’ll experience full satisfaction with your new UpperFit wireless headphones or we’ll do whatever it takes to make it right! 

So go ahead, try these premium headphones risk free when you Click Add to Cart Now.
feature_bullets: HD TRUE WIRELESS EARBUDS W/ DUAL SPEAKERS – IMPECCABLE SOUND QUALITY, UNRIVALED CALL CLARITY: Don’t settle for flat, 1980’s sounding wireless headphones! Upperfit 3D HD dual speaker system delivers the full surround sound stereo experience you’d experience with premium home theater systems. You’ll feel the THUMPIN’ BASE, SMOOTH TREBLE and PIN DROP CALL CLARITY within 40 FEET of ANY PAIRED DEVICE, guaranteed.

18 HOURS OF POWER – NO RECHARGE REQUIRED: Portable charging case makes keeping the music flowing a breeze. Simply charge the portable power case, take it with you, and place your cordless earbuds inside. Magnetic power pouch automatically starts and stops (preserving energy for next charge), adding another 3.5 - 4 hours listening time, 5 times in a row, without plugging into a wall. Now that’s true beats on the go!

COMFORT COMES STANDARD – ACTIVE PEOPLE LOVE THESE! While sweaty gym sessions fry most headphones Upperfit’s SWEAT PROOF IPx4 rated earbuds with mic and earhook caps lightweight, molded design comfortably snuggle into your ears, without chafing, sliding, or slipping around. Seriously, if you love to run, cycle, hike, swim and stay active WITHOUT STOPPING to adjust, these are the headset earbuds for you.

3 SECOND UNIVERSAL PAIRING: Want fast, easily, seamless pairing? What if you could instantly pair any device in seconds? Upperfit wireless headphones with microphone quickly, easily and enjoyable PAIR IN SECONDs with your cell phone, Samsung Galaxy android, iphone, TV, tablet, laptop, smart watch, and maintains solid, crisp, clear connection at 40 feet. So you experience amazing sound and call quality at work, the gym, and at play.

TRY RISK FREE – SATISFACTION 100% GUARANTEED: There’s a reason we call these ‘pin drop’ headphones. You’ll hear all the music and voice quality you expect, without a peep from the outside world. In fact, we guarantee you’ll experience full satisfaction with your new UpperFit wireless blue tooth ear buds for 1 full year, or expect a full, prompt, courteous refund or exchange – whatever works best for you!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,033 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
